title: Baltimore-Washington Parkway: Nearby Attractions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Nearby Attractions            Nearby Attractions       Close distance to Baltimore Washington Parkway  City of Greenbelt including museum 301-474-8000 The city of Greenbelt was one of three towns built in the 1930's by the federal government as part of the New Deal.  Goddard Space Flight Center (NASA) Visitor Center 301-286-3979 Discover man's exporation into Space.  College Park Aviation Museum 301-864-6029  Did you know that Orville Wright delivered the first U.S. Mail flight at College Park airport?  University of Maryland 301-405-1000  Home of the Maryland Terrapins  Beltsville Agricultural Research Center 301-504-9403 Patuxent Wildlife Visitor Center 301-497-5760  Discover a part of the U.S. Fish and Wildlife refuge system.
